summary: With this mod you can REALLY fly in the sky of Skyrim with some Chaurus Hunters (Mounts). You have also an Orcish Hut with 2 companions and some toys.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][size="9"] Fully Flying Chaurus Hunters [/size][/b] [/color] [color=#00ff00]Version 4.0[/color] (The 6 Fully Flying Mounts [i]Blood/Reptilian/Pebbled/Swamp/Peat Bog Chaurus Hunters + Flying Scrib [/i]are around an [b][i]Orcish Hut[/i] [/b]located between the Western Watchtower and Whiterun; You have also [i]with the Giant Wasp [/i]the 7 Summonable Fully Flying Mounts)

The DLCs Dawnguard/Dragonborn and also [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/] Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) [/url] are Required


[color=#00ff00]Optional File: Esp version Française[/color]



Grommok is an orc who lives in a hut near Whiterun.

It is a hunter who moves with his tamed flying creatures that are nearby.

It is also a woodcutter, who uses wood for his fire, but also to make the small toys, which his son Junior collects ...


[i]Grommok est un orque qui vit dans une cabane près de Blancherive.

C’est un chasseur qui se déplace avec ses créatures volantes apprivoisées qui se trouvent à proximité.

C’est aussi un bucheron, qui utilise le bois pour son feu, mais aussi pour fabriquer des petits jouets, que son fils Junior collectionne…[/i]



[i]If your mount disappears (with impossibility to dismount): Be patient a few seconds or Zoom out with the scroll Wheel or FAST TRAVEL[/i]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/TV7Oe1X.gif[/img]

[i] To have the SUMMONABLE Mounts, you must buy the “Spell tome: Summon XXXX”, at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais bleu in Solitude).

With the books, you have the spells (Duration of the summon: 10 min.) ...

[size="7"][color=#ff0000] (frequently) You MUST mount the Summoned Chaurus Hunter, dismount and re-mount again before flying ![/color][/size]

You can easily DISMISS when you want ! with an other "Spell tome: Dismiss Summoned Flyable Chaurus Hunter" [/i]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=914544flyingChaurusHunters2.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/914544flyingChaurusHunters2.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000] [size="9"][b] Controls [/b] [/size] [/color]


[color=#ff0000]UP[/color]: [color=#00ff00] Left Shift[/color]

[color=#ff0000]DOWN[/color]: [color=#00ff00] Left Ctrl[/color]

[color=#ff0000]DOWN to the ground quickly[/color]: [color=#00ff00] E or Space[/color]

[color=#00ff00] W[/color] (or Z): [color=#ff0000]forward[/color]

[color=#00ff00] S[/color]: [color=#ff0000]backward[/color]

[color=#00ff00] A[/color] (or Q): [color=#ff0000]turn left[/color]

[color=#00ff00] D[/color]: [color=#ff0000]turn right[/color]

When flying press [color=#ff0000]F12 [/color] to reconfigure the Keys (...a little problem: it is the default screenshot button on Steam ! You can go into Steam and disabled screenshots)

If there is a problem with the F12 key, uncheck the mod, make a backup and then check again the mod

[i][b]Thanks to Supertin/FeuerTin for this video[/b] [/i] (version 1.1):

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]jRPBGTmLx5c[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=793460flyingChaurusHunters4.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/793460flyingChaurusHunters4.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b] INSTALLATION[/b][/color] (very important)

[color=#00ff00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

1) You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "

[color=#00ff00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

2) [color=#ff0000]You must place the .esp at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game to obtain the 8 books...(Normally, this is done automatically)[/color]

3) (Only if you have download other mods "Summon...") You must INSTALL the summons (my other mods "summon") ONE BY ONE ! to obtain the books (ALL my mods are STANDALONE !)

You can find the “Spell tome: Summon XXXX”,at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whitherun/Blancherive) or with an other Spell Vendor (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

Duration of the summon: 10 min.

4) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001

These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=941024flyingChaurusHunters1.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/941024flyingChaurusHunters1.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=566396Blood1.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/566396Blood1.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000] [size="6"] [b]Credits [/b][/size][/color]

[color=#ff8c00]Markus Liberty[/color] for the Orcish Hut in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52289/?] Orcish Hut Kit [/url]

[color=#ff8c00]ps46183[/color] for the Orc Dresser and the Orc Buffet in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72964/?] Fully Functional Orc Furniture Resources [/url]

[color=#ff8c00]NoxyGame[/color] and [color=#ff8c00]DOSMaster[/color] for the script of the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29860/? ] Pegasus MLP fully flyable [/url] “feel free to use/enhance the script/nif/mod, but give credits to the authors”

[color=#ff0000]JSnider193[/color] for the new textures of the Chaurus Hunters ( Blood, Reptilian, Pebbled) in his mod (« Modders resources and tutorials »): [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6472/?]Critter Variants [/url] ("You can modify and use as needed")

[color=#ff0000] Grohiik [/color] for the meshes/textures of the Swamp/Peat Bog Chaurus Hunters and [color=#ff0000] Lifestorock[/color] for the mesh/textures of the Flying Scrib in the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24913/?]Skyrim Immersive Creatures [/url]by lifestorock

[color=#ff0000] Stroti -Tamira - Arion[/color] for some stuff in the mods [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64655/?] Stroti's Mushroom House Resource [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62787/?] Stroti's Treehouse Resource [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17332/?] Rockinghorses [/url] (Original model of the rockinghorse: Walery Nowak), and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16625/?] Teddybears [/url] (Original model of the teddy: Abitor)

[color=#ff0000]MihailMods[/color] for the Giant Wasp (model and sound) in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82505/?] Giant Wasps- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons- ESO) [/url]

[color=#ff0000]atomec [/color] for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25361/?] Orcish Sabre [/url] («You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me »)

[color=#ff0000]digger23[/color] for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80249/?] Wooden toys [/url] (« They are free to use as you see fit »)

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=988808swamp2.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/988808swamp2.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b] Bugs or Problems[/b][/color]

(frequently) You MUST mount the summoned Chaurus Hunter, dismount and re-mount again before flying !

You only have to be careful to not crash into the ground (apparently they can also burrow underground) !

[i]If your mount disappears (with impossibility to dismount): Be patient a few seconds or Zoom out with the scroll Wheel or FAST TRAVEL[/i]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=304000flyingscrib1.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/304000flyingscrib1.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=798025reptilianchaurushunter3.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/798025reptilianchaurushunter3.jpg[/img][/url]

With my mods, you have other Fully Flyable Mounts!

11 Fully Flyable Mounts with the version 2.7 of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20351/?] Monster Mounts [/url]:
[color=#00ff00]Green Atronach, Magic Anomaly, Flame, Stormy, Paalaz, Pazuzu, Spectrum, Fire, Mjöllnir, Azraël, Nerthus[/color]

7 Fully Flyable Mounts with the version 1.5.1 of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25511/?] Monster Mounts Dawnguard [/url]:
[color=#00ff00]Chaurus Hunter, Chaurus Hunter Fledgling, Soul Wisp, Death Wing, Red Naga, Swamp Naga, Skeleton Mistman[/color]

9 Fully Flyable Mounts with the version 2.6 of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31538/?] Monster Mounts Dragonborn [/url]:
[color=#00ff00]Bone Storm, Ash Guardian, Aazidal, Dukaan, Seeker, Netch, Flying Shoggoth, Spectral Dragon, Flying Scrib[/color]

And 58 Dragons in my mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61101/?] Fully Flying Dragons [/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=532164GiantWasp1.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/532164GiantWasp1.jpg[/img][/url]
author: gg77

files.name: Flying Mounts Chaurus Hunters 4.0
files.changelogHtml:
Version 4.0: correction of bugs

Version 3.5: Adds Rockinghorse and Teddy Bear

Version 3.0: Adds the son of Grommok with some toys

Version 2.6 : Adds statues and an Orc Companion with an Orc Sabre

Version 2.2: Adds a Summonable (only) Giant Wasp

Version 2.1: Adds a Orc Dresser and a Orc Buffet

Version 2.0: The Chaurus Hunters are around an Orcish Hut

Version 1.3.1: Adds 6 Summonable Flyable Mounts

Version 1.2.1: They stay at the chosen location

Version 1.2: Adds a Peat Bog Chaurus Hunter + some changes in the settings
